title: Tagliatelle with green sauce
ingredients: ['225 g (8 oz) baby spinach, thick stalks discarded', '100 g (3½ oz) watercress, thick stalks discarded', '125 g (4½ oz) frozen peas', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) fresh tagliatelle', '2 tsp cornflour', '200 ml (7 fl oz) Greek-style yogurt', '4 tbsp chopped parsley', '6 sprigs of fresh basil, torn into pieces', 'salt and pepper']
